## ProgramBuilder.floatBitsToUint() method

Same as floatBitsToUint builtin function in GLSL, only valid for WebGL2 device and WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
floatBitsToUint(x: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```
